resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104966</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104966</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204033</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Model United Nations Headquarters</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorbildliche Nationen Hauptsitze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Siège des Nations Unies Modèles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matrizes Unidas Modelo Das Nações</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sedi Di Nazioni Unite Di modello</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρότυπη έδρα Ηνωμένων Εθνών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Jefaturas De Naciones Unidas Modelo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Model United Nations (UN) is an authentic simulation of the U.N. General Assembly and other multilateral bodies. This Headquarters homepage offers an 'ask an ambassador' section, an overview of the Model UN, FAQ, information on how to get started and how to prepare for a conference. Users can also follow links to several interactive forums, a conference calendar, additional links and e-news.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorbildliche Nationen (UNO) sind eine authentische
Simulation von U.N. Generalversammlung und andere vielseitige Körper.
Dieses fragen Hauptsitze, die homepage ein ' anbietet, einen
Botschafter ' Kapitel, einen Überblick über das Modell UNO, FAQ, 
Informationen über, wie man begonnen erhält und wie man für eine 
Konferenz vorbereitet. Benutzer können Links zu einigen 
interaktiven Foren, zu einem Konferenzkalender, zu den zusätzlichen 
Links und zu den Enachrichten auch folgen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Nations Unies modèles (l'ONU) est une 
simulation authentique de l'Assemblée générale d'U.N. et d'autres 
corps multilatéraux. Ceci siège les offres de homepage que une
section 'demandez à ambassadeur ', une vue d'ensemble du modèle 
l'ONU, FAQ, l'information sur la façon dont obtenir commencé et la 
façon se préparer à une conférence. Les utilisateurs peuvent
également suivre des liens à plusieurs forum interactifs, à un 
calendrier de conférence, aux liens supplémentaires et aux 
e-nouvelles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Modele as nações unidas (UN) é uma simulação 
authentic do general conjunto e outros corpos multilateral de U.N.. 
Isto sedía as ofertas que ' pergunte uma seção de um 
embaixador ', uma vista geral do homepage do modelo UN, FAQ, 
informação em como começar começado e em como preparar-se para uma
conferência. Os usuários podem também seguir as ligações a 
diversos forums interativos, a um calendário da conferência, às 
ligações adicionais e às e-notícias.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le Nazioni Unite di modello (NU) sono una 
simulazione autentica dell'assemblea generale di U.N. e di altri corpi
multilaterali. Ciò acquartiera le offerte che 'chieda una 
sezione all'ambasciatore ', una descrizione del homepage del modello 
NU, FAQ, le informazioni su come ottenere cominciata e su come
prepararsi per un congresso. Gli utenti possono anche seguire i 
collegamenti a parecchie tribune interattive, ad un calendario di 
congresso, ai collegamenti supplementari ed alle e-notizie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρότυπα Ηνωμένα Έθνη (UN) είναι μια αυθεντική 
προσομοίωση της γενικής συμβολικής γλώσσας των Η.Ε και άλλων 
πολύπλευρων οργανισμών. Αυτή η αρχική σελίδα έδρας 
προσφέρει ένα τμήμα "ρωτά πρεσβευτών", μια επισκόπηση των 
πρότυπων Η.Ε, FAQ, πληροφορίες για το πώς να πάρει αρχισμένη 
και πώς να προετοιμαστεί για μια διάσκεψη. Οι χρήστες 
μπορούν επίσης να ακολουθήσουν τις συνδέσεις με διάφορα 
διαλογικά φόρουμ, ένα ημερολόγιο διασκέψεων, πρόσθετες 
συνδέσεις και ε-ειδήσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Naciones Unidas modelo (la O.N.U) son una 
simulación auténtica de la Asamblea General de U.N. y de otros 
cuerpos multilateral. Esto establece jefatura de las ofertas que
' pregunte una sección a embajador ', una descripción del homepage 
del modelo la O.N.U, FAQ, información sobre cómo conseguir comenzada
y cómo prepararse para una conferencia. Los utilizadores pueden
también seguir conexiones a varios foros interactivos, a un 
calendario de la conferencia, a las conexiones adicionales y a las 
e-noticias.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204033</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104966</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/model-united-nations-headquarters</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
